description:
Katsura Kokoro is the sweet-natured younger sister of http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha]. Unlike her older sibling, Kokoro is peppy, talkative and full of curiosity who is just as teasing as she is apprehensive of Kotonoha.
She has a good friend named http://anidb.net/ch62823 [Uzuki] and affectionately looks up to http://anidb.net/ch2344 [Makoto] as her older brother.
Kokoro lives with Kotonoha and their mother Manami and father.
name: Katsura Kokoro
